remarks: Given a topology and a filtered set, return the convergence function on the functions from the filtered set to the base set of the topological space.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 14-Oct-2009.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2013.)  (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 6-Aug-2015.)
statement:
flffval $p |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ L e. ( Fil ` Y ) ) -> ( J fLimf L ) = ( f e. ( X ^m Y ) |-> ( J fLim ( ( X FilMap f ) ` L ) ) ) ) $.
$d J f $.
$d L f $.
$d X f $.
$d Y f $.
